GSD.description:
ext4: avoid cycles in directory h-tree

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.46 by commit 3a3ce941645407cd0b0b7f01ad9e2ea3770f46cc. For more details please see the references link.
